name: Noi
description:
Noi is one of the hardest arcade games ever.

Are you ready to dive into an endless adventure into Noi's world where timing is everything.

Your mission is to reach the top of the Pyramid. It sounds easy right ? Well you should not judge a book by its cover. you definitely need to give it a try.
Your reaction time will determine your destiny.
We bet you don't have what it takes to handle the pressure.

Don't forget to check the android version.it has more features and more levels coming soon.
